post.summary: By passing in the appropriate options, you can create a new group.
post.description: Example Query: POST /groups/create?name=lexiiscool&description=this is a description

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: pass a description of the group

200.description: Returns document ID, group structure containing name, description, members, joinId

403.description: Authorization failed, or user does not have permission.

get.summary: Finds a group with given Document ID from request, returns json-encoded array of its array of data, saved as "data"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Document ID of group to obtain data from

400.description: no ID provided to search for.

403.description: Authorization failed, or user does not have permission.

get.summary: Finds the joinId of a group with given ID from request, returns json-encoded array of this Id, saved as "joinId"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of group to obtain joinId for.

403.description: Authorization failed, or user does not have permission.

delete.summary: Deletes group with given Document ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Document ID of group to delete

403.description: Authorization failed, or user does not have permission.

patch.summary: Edits data for group with given ID from query parameters such as name and description
patch.description: Example Query: PATCH /groups/edit?id=zBZvVSe5MXNXLDDSnIPn&name=new group name&description=changed group description

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Document ID of group to edit

403.description: Authorization failed, or user does not have permission.

patch.summary: Adds a member to a group, given a joinId and userId

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId of user to add to group

403.description: Authorization failed, or user does not have permission.

404.description: Group does not exist or could not be found
